articles.title: Coronavirus Scotland: Joy as youngest Scots patient aged 3 weeks sent home after beating virus - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
A THREE-week-old baby believed to be Scotlands youngest coronavirus patient has been released from hospital after beating the virus.
Newborn baby girl Peyton was eight weeks premature when she was delivered by C-section on March 26.
The tiny tot was being c… [+2409 chars]
